name: Anne Martin
text:
This Wine boutique is a great addition to Pour Baby. The boutique/ gift shop is a very welcoming space, bright and open.

I arrived with ideas to purchase but the customer service was limited. After more than few minutes, someone asked if I needed assistance and unfortunately, it was a bit rushed. They were working with another customer when they asked.

I wandered around the store, I think, about 10 - 15 minutes. I didn't have a lot of time, so I wasn't able to wait until they finished with the other customer.  There was only one person available for customer service, but it looked as though they were preparing for an event, I saw tables outside and the door was open when I arrived.

There's an array of wines, gourmet food and truffles just to name a few reasons to check this place out. I had my eye on a couple of things so I'll definitely be back when I have time to linger and browse.

I didn't have an opportunity to ask about the wine tastings or the personal consults for gift baskets because of the limited service. It's easy enough to check their website for the classes and there's plenty of time to check back for basket ideas.

It's a great place to get gifts for family, friends or co-workers.

name: C Lynn
text: The hours are very tight if you work until 5pm, I was excited to go in on my off day friday but was turned away by a frowning lady saying they were closed. The hours on the door showed open 10am-6pm with no closed notification there or on social media/google? A disappointment for sure but will try again another day and hope they are open.

name: Dyann Munoz
text: My friend and I try to attend every wine pairing they offer.  So fun.  So beautifully presented and Lavone does an amazing job of selecting and prepairing the most wonderful cheese boards, salads and lovely bites.  It's a full sensory experience.  Looking forward to the next one.

name: Vicki Nicholas
text: My new favorite place. So friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Karen Cormier
text: They have a nice selection of balsamic vinegars and flavored olive oils.  Lots of gift items and wines.

name: Paula Lindon
text: Very friendly staff. Went above and beyond to find the scent I wanted in wallflowers even though they did not have it on the floor. The sales associate with certain they had it and she looked in other places in the store and found it for me. Very impressed!

name: Jessica Cost
text: I shopped at this location a few weeks ago for the first time and was impressed! I wasn't hounded, but yet I wasn't ignored either. The store was spiffy, the guy who helped me out on the floor was super nice and knowledgeable. And best of all... no Bridgestreet traffic!

name: Naomi Cooper
text: Greeted immed, asked us what we were looking for, AWESOME CUSTOMER SERVICE

name: Whitney Anyanwu
text: Very attentive staff, smaller store but has a good stock.

name: Angelia Rembert
text: I came in after working out, the 2 ladies were so focused on me and constantly asking me questions that they couldn't see the 2 women that was stealing merchandise! I (PURCHASED) over $176 worth of what I like. Employees everyone does not steal no matter what you (look) like.

name: Shalea154
text: We have given this store 3 different tries. Each time, the employees only care about chatting with each other or looking at their phones. This visit, I finally had to step out of line and go ask a group of 4 associates if anyone in the store is actually qualified to work a register. And by the way, the “Keith” that posted that the staff is great, works there.

text:

text: Really annoyed that the online hours reflect that this location opens at 10am. Drove all the way over to only  see a sign that shows they open at noon on Sunday. Change the online hours!!!

name: Tara Dixon
text:
Placed an order for anniversary and it was suppose to be delivered today April 16, 2021. When I called the store, worker said it was in transit. Arrangement never arrived.

I expect a full refund first thing in the morning. If they couldn’t provide the service why take my money and then lie like it’s in transit.

Adding insult to injury, Cory Lewis, if that’s even his name called the recipient to say that the delivery address was outside of their delivery zone. However, no one called this morning to say that was the case, and even when I called at 4:49 pm, the woman who answered did not state this, she said the delivery was in transit.

Then to put icing on the cake, Cory Lewis called me to say they tried to deliver the order but the man didn’t expect the order, there was no man at the address all day and someone was literally sitting home waiting on the order all day. Then he tried to add yet another lie to that.

Professionalism and truthfulness is not a big ask when doing business, this placed missed big. I expect a refund and a call from management.

name: Monica Bray-Grant
text: Placed an order on Wednesday for an arrangement to be delivered on Friday for my Mother In Law's birthday. Called Thursday afternoon to see about adding some additional instructions to her delivery. The rep informed me that they are not doing deliveries to Tuskegee that weekend but will deliver to that area next weekend? What kind of business are they running here? No one had even called me to let me know that it was not going to be delivered. Shabby business!

name: Beverly Butler
text: Fabulous and quick service! Order online even if you need delivery for a birthday the next day. I was able to order and have this wonderful gift delivered even though I couldn't be there to celebrate the event. I hope your experience goes as well as mine!

name: Shay G
text: I am 32 weeks pregnant an had a craving for their chocolate covered strawberries. The cashier was extremely rude as I was ordering my 6 strawberries. It had just turned 2pm an she said it would take 20-30 minutes and as I’m looking at the smoothies she tells me we close at 3pm and i don’t have any fruit chopped for smoothies (rolls her eyes and gasps for air). I honestly didn’t appreciate her whole attitude and decided not to even purchase here.

name: Takeya Wilkins
text: I called in to place an order over the phone. My call was answered quickly and professionally. I was not sure what exactly I wanted but the representative gave me multiple options based on the information I provided of who I was sending it to. The call took less than 10 minutes to get me taken care of. I appreciated the expedient service! My mom LOVED her arrangement. The fruit was fresh and actually looked like the photo! I will be ordering again from this store!

name: Michelle
text: Thank you NIKKI for your amazing customer service!! Very well spoken and catered to my edible arrangement needs!!

name: Monique Holland
text: I have used this company multiple times and have found them to be courteous and very professional. All of the deliveries arrived on time and my guests devoured the fruit trays (especially chocolate covered strawberries) before any of the other items!! They create amazing arrangements that I have even used as centerpieces.

name: Kelroderick Pittman
text: Nice friendly staff. They greeted me as soon as ai walked through the door. I wpuld highly recommend this place to everyone.

name: IMF
text: I ordered super late on V-day and they still delivered in a timely manner to recipient!! I was hesitant at first b/c of the reviews but, to give them a chance. I'm glad I took a gamble. The recipient enjoyed their arrangement and raved at how fresh and delicious the fruit was!! Thanks guys!!

text: I must say my husband ordered several boxes from this location and each time they never failed on quality.  Excellent politeness from the clerk but when I asked for a bag she stated she didn't have any.  Great products! !!

text: I love the Opelika location great arrangements and nice staff

name: Sarah Davis
text: If I could give this place less than one star I would. Courtney (the owner) is a consistent liar. He makes promise after promise when confronted and never delivers. If this place stays open for the next 6 months I will be SHOCKED with poor management like that.

name: Tamara Williams
text: Excellent customer service.  Beautiful arrangement. I will definitely order from this store again.

name: Kent Whitaker
text:
Horrible experience. My wife and I are not in Auburn so we chose this company to deliver an arrangement for Valentines Day for my mother-in-law in Opelika. We ordered a higher dollar item other than the lower priced special. Specifically for the reason of having more fruit and less chocolate as we were hoping for something a bit healthier because of health issues. They charged our credit card for the higher priced item we ordered but delivered the lower price special with added chocolate and it was a smaller item. In addition to the wrong item - they did not deliver it on Valentines Day. We called several times and they acted nice at first and promised to deliver the item the next day. Late in the day mom called and said it was never delivered. We called back and it was being delivered late in the day - a day late - and it was the wrong item, not the higher priced one we paid for.

We called again and one of the employees admitted they went to the wrong house on Valentines day so somebody got the higher priced item. My wife called again to at least get a refund for the overcharged amount or to have the right item delivered. We were promised the right item would be delivered. The next day, no delivery.

At this point, several days after Valentines Day my wife gave up so I started calling, was promised a refund or a deliver of the right item. There was no refund or proper delivery. I was then promised at least a call back from the owner, then another promise, another promised call back. I never heard back.

My mother in law never received the correct item and and we never got the refund. We finally tried to cancel payment with credit card and to get a refund but they disputed it - said that the item was delivered. Did not mention that it was the wrong item, and that it was late, missing Valentines Day. I'm sorry that they delivered the item, possibly twice, to the wrong house, and then the wrong item to the right address. That's three deliveries, three trips, three items. However, those mistakes are not our fault. All I know is that my mother in law never received what was ordered.

I would not recommend this company to another person.

I would probably have written a different review if the owner would have called me back as promised by the several employees.

name: C. K.
text: Fresh and on time delivery. Good customer service. I highly recommend this business.

name: Kate Dorsey
text: Placed an order well in advance enough to have delivered on mother in laws birthday, followed the ‘track your order’ the entire day of said scheduled delivery, and it finally changed to “arranging your order now” around lunchtime, and never changed again after that. I called several times, contacted via the live chat and email on website, had an automated reply sent with my “case number” saying I’d be contacted by the store. Never was. 3 days later on Monday I finally got someone on the phone and all she said was “yeah i don’t even what happened with that order haha. Do you want me to send it today?” (Never even got an apology or any type of discount offer or even an explanation) 4 days after her birthday? ummm yeah, no thanks. Never again. WAY too overpriced for quality of product and customer service

text: Sorry everyone - we can't seem to get this listing updated to show our correct address.  The phone number is correct so please give us a call. name: Hazel K
text: I paid for next day delivery flowers to be sent to my niece on her birthday. I received a confirmation that they were delivered Late Friday afternoon. I called my niece to see if they were delivered and they were NOT. I immediately called the shop several times and left voicemails. No response - the shop was closed for the weekend. Long story short, they delivered to the wrong address, despite the correct address being on file with the purchase. It was very important for me to send flowers ON her birthday and not 4 days later. It was disappointing and a hassle to figure out what happened. There was no flower upgrade, add on, or partial refund to make up for the huge mistake on their part.

resp.text: Please give us an opportunity to research and respond properly to this situation before leaving a negative review. We value every order and do everything in our power to make sure your order is delivered correct and on time. Without know the specifics of this order I can’t help you resolve the problem. I realize it is too late for her birthday but I still need to determine what happened based on how the order was placed. Please send an email to wecare@jenilynscreations.com with your full name, phone number, the recipient, and the address given so we can address this properly.

name: tls 1024
text: The arrangement was delivered with the wrong card on it. This is not the first time I’ve had an issue with this florist. Last time they offered a partial refund to remove my bad review and I complied but this time I have to give my review. I’m not happy with the arrangement and wonder since the card was wrong if I possibly received the wrong arrangement. Even if not it’s not a very nice arrangement. I could’ve cut flowers out of my garden and stuck in a vase.

resp.text: We are sincerely sorry about the card message.  It was a mistake in our office and we take full responsibility for that.  The sender was wanting to acknowledge your family with a gift of flowers and their deepest sympathy.  Again we are very sorry for your disappointment.

name: Jobelle Collie
text: My son sent me flowers for Mother’s Day last week from Jenilyn’s and my daughter sent flowers from another florist.  They were supposed to look similar, based on online pictures. The flowers my daughter sent (from another florist) look as good a week later as they did the day they arrived.  Since my children live out of State, they rely on online photos to decide what to send. Please don’t ruin any more holidays please.

resp.text: Please give us an opportunity to make it right before leaving a negative review. I assure you we didn’t send out flowers that were less than optimal but we will gladly replace them if contacted directly within a reasonable time. All you have to do is call us at 334-567-3325.

We had out of town family and friends place orders through her as well, and there were no complaints on any arrangement.  Definitely my go-to florist for the area for any floral needs!

name: Jack Schlee
text: I ordered flowers twice. Both times they were not what I ordered.

resp.text: We are so sorry you had a problem. We just tried to call you and no answer. We’ll be glad to take whatever corrective measure you would like. Please let us know.

name: Lynne White
text: I get the Cheese Hooies and the Crisp Sweet Pickles. Love both of them. I try to stock up on both before I run out of them.

name: Janice Froberg
text:
I loved this little shop because it's a little hidden away gem that a lot of folks probably doesn't know exist. I didn't, until just recently.
Everything there is made from scratch; the old fashioned way. And boy... is it delicious! Their brittle candies are to die for! Everyone needs to try this place, at least once... you'll be glad you did.

name: Tere King
text: Great little shop... Cheese hooies are the bomb!!! Pecan brittle pretty tasty too...

name: Trent Eubanks
text: Nice selection of homemade goodies in wonderful southern setting. Worth the the backcountry drive for the food and to meet the proprietor.

name: Dale Parrish
text: A contractor gave me a jar of peanut brittle for Xmas.... wow best I’ve ever tasted !!!

name: Rachel Holloman
text: Absolutely great staff and wonderful products.  The brittle is divine; many of the other products are scrumptious too.

name: Genna LaPerla
text: I have loved this treat since I was a  baby. Worth the drive from Texas

name: Janet Suter
text: Fantastic!! Thank you Josie for your kindness and spending time with our Daugther. Everything we tried was scrumptious and I LOVE that it is made right there. We bought the pecan brittle and roasted garlic pecans. I grew up with a pecan tree in my Grandparents yard and we made peanut brittle all the time so I was brought right back to childhood. If you pass this place without stopping and it's open it is your loss!!!

name: Grace Howard
text: I absolutely love everything they make! The best is the Peanut Brittle that is so thin that it melts in your mouth!

name: Precision Graphics
text: Great customer service and the candy is outstanding. Highly recommended.

name: Jami D
text: The greatest candies you have ever eaten! The pecan candies and peanut brittle are both unbelievable!!

name: Barry Borum
text: Best peanut brittle on this planet. A+++

name: Roberta Bush
text: Best place to get Peanut Brittle!!

name: Catfish 5235
text: Best brittle  around

name: Cheryl Merritt
text: Love it

name: Bryan Balentine
text: Yum

name: Tony Canterberry
text: Flawless store! Perfectly organized, incredibly clean! Super cool, friendly staff! 5 stars!

name: Wendy Guillory
text:
I am writing this review to draw attention to a serious matter regarding the offensive behavior exhibited by Manager Beth. The incident occurred on the evening of 07/22/2021 at the Alabaster Alabama location. I frequently visit the Alabaster location, however Sales Manager Beth made my experience horrible. Due to the negative experience,  I will never visit that particular location.I’ve never been so disappointed with service.
I reported the horrible experience to customer service and I am hopeful that the problem will be corrected but I would like to make all shoppers aware. A shopping experience should be delightful and not confrontational.

Happy shopping!!

name: Laquisha Grace
text: The store was extremely neat and organized.  All the staff was friendly. I got a ton of great products.

name: Jennifer Christian
text: Love that store, enjoy there bodywash , candles and there plug-ins 😀😍👍🏽💖👏💫

name: Sam Johnson
text: Went today for $2.95 sale. Store organized staff helpful. Just go early during sale days they were pretty wiped out but 2pm

name: Key S
text: Awesome as usual! Great products and superb customer service !👌

name: T
text:
I purchased items at a store and I forgot a coupon. I went back and brought the items to get the coupon added. The lady said one of the items was not on the receipt. That wasn’t my fault. So, instead of letting me keep the free item (THAT WASNT ADDED) she charge me for it and added my coupon towards it. I got annoyed and told her to just add charge me for the item and I’ll pay the difference with the coupon added. INSTEAD, she refunded everything and recharge me again for the full price. I check my balance and it still show I’m currently charge for two amounts. I did get a refund. I’ll wait 3-5 days but if I don’t get my money back. We got a problem.

Instead of getting a free bonus air freshener. I got charge extra for something that wasn’t added and lost a free item. I WAS BASICALLY BETTER NOT RETURNING BACK TO THE STORE.

name: Tameka Perdue
text: I love it employees are very nice & helpful.

name: Sydney Getz
text: They’re always so nice and helpful! Love this store and will always recommend to anyone looking for a bath and Body in the area. Sometimes the policies and coupons can be confusing but this staff is always so patient and understanding. Couldn’t say enough nice things about them.

name: Dorothy Guillory
text: I visited the Bath and Body's Location in Calara, The first thing I noticed was the face mask that the staff was wearing, Not only was they protecting themselves by wearing the face mask they were also protecting the customers.

name: ashley bee
text: Alabaster bath and body is ALWAYS a joy to shop! The ladies that work here are SUPER nice and helpful. I will always shop here

name: Lynn Williams
text: Love B&BW, but I hate that they never had a good online sale during the pandemic when people needed their products, not just wanted them. Shows they care only about money

name: AC
text: beautiful and organized store! everyone was friendly, patient, and helpful. shannon was really kind and helped us out so much! will definitely be coming back to this location.

name: Jessica Black
text: We really enjoyed our experience here. The store is clean, organized and pleasantly fragranced. An employee named Jordan was not only helpful, but very personable and such a joy to talk with. She was very interactive with us and my little girl even while she was working hard, which made us feel at home. She needs a promotion for her dedication and warmheartedness! I have absolutely no complaints here!

name: Liz C.
text: Went two days ago because I ran out of hand sanitizer and wanted more soap. There's really helpful arrows so all shoppers kept good distance, the sales team was very cheerful - I think they like their work. They talked me into a new scent for beside the kitchen sink! I will be back!!!!

name: Mary Costlow
text: Great sale going on today in store.  Greeted at door with a shopping bag and cheerful sales associate.  Store has just reopened and they were starting to get busy.  Well stocked and ready for shoppers.

name: Tonja Collier
text: Very friendly and helpful

name: Bryan Hensley
text: Jordan was absolutely delightful! The store was clean, organized and had a huge selection. I DEFINITELY recommend!

name: Dominique Houser
text: I love bath and body wirk the staff is amazing and I can always fine a deal.

name: Ashley Headley
text: Never have a problem when I go. I’m there every week just about, and I always receive outstanding customer service.

name: Marion Russell
text: Knowledgeable and courteous to help with the what's happening , even better with the weekly flyer through email.

name: John Galliera
text: Great gifts.

name: Candis Threatt
text: Sales! Bought candles(3 wick!), body wash all under $40! Customer service is always top notch!

name: Kimberly Whatley
text: Nice and helpful staff

name: Kimberly Ballard
text: Mmmmm smelled so good. Staff dying to wait on me. Very helpful

name: Cortney C
text: Great sale on aromatherapy! Jordan was the best!

name: J. Terry McCombs
text: One of my wife's favorite shops for soaps and fragrances.

name: Christina Chamblee
text: Love the service and kindness

name: Monique Moore
text: I was very excited when I found out there would be a Bath and Body Works in my area. I went once before with no problem. I went tonight and there were 2 customers there me another lady. I stood in line for a very long time while the lady in front of me was being assisted. Once it was my turn I asked the sales associate behind the counter if they only had 1 register open? When she tried to respond the manager comes over and was very rude and said yes there are no customers here so we just have one and walked away. I advised her that she was very rude and left the items there. The manager at this store needs more customer service training, you had more employees working than customers but I still waiting a lengthy time to be helped and she laughed like she didn't care. I will be reporting this to corporate.

name: Veronica Ramos
text: I went in yesterday and let me just say. There was a employee there who didn’t know what she was doing. On Bath and Body Works webiste it advertised a sale in store and online for any select lotions for $3.95. I grabbed my Japanese Cherry blossom body cream and went to go check out. It rung up at $13.00. I politely asked why didn’t it pop up at $3.95. She said what do you mean? I showed her the page and said there’s a sale going on. She proceeded to say “I need to see a barcode to scan” Clearly there was no bar code but she proceeded to roll her eyes and scan a peice of paper to give the discount. Other than that. I had a good experience.

name: Cindi Freeman
text: They have the best customer service

name: George Young Jr
text: Didn't have anything

name: Niki Hope Talton
text: Semi-annual sale. $3.12,$3.37,and $3.95 lotions, sprays, and gels. Must get there.

name: Alicia Talley
text: Candles, Candles, Candles!

name: A H
text: Thank You Martha Rea’s! My mom loves the  flowers I had delivered for her birthday!!  Will definitely buy from you again!

name: Alisha Myrsa
text: Very helpful people.

name: Helena Bosch
text: I am so thrilled with the service and flowers! I ordered (online) a cake made of flowers the day before! And they were delivered as ordered and looked beautiful. Thank you so much.

name: Jude Saint
text: Timely delivery. My wife loved the roses 🌹.

name: Menita Hyde
text: I called at 4:00 in the afternoon with an urgent request for flowers to be delivered to a funeral home and the service was the next morning. The florist was so kind to work with me to get a basket out that day. She was limited in what she could offer but she took time to let me know my options and put together a lovely basket. The family was very complimentary of how beautiful the basket was. Thank you so much for going above and beyond to offer exceptional customer service.

name: Allan Dunlap
text: The go to for all your floal arrangements.

name: Lydia Nations
text: Flowers were suppose to be delivered by 12pm for my friends birthday, did not arrive till 3:40pm. I called the shop to see if the mistake was from bloomstoday.com or their shop. She said they must have missed the notice of the time. I guess the positive thing is they were honest...the flowers are pretty. :/

name: Charlotte Maise
text: Great job on the pink and white carnations delivered to my granddaughter. She loved them and said that they were the prettiest flowers she had ever seen. I was just sent a recent picture of them and they are still beautiful!

name: Erin Brager
text: I had the best experience ever. I will definitely be returning. The flowers smelled amazing and were delivered promptly. I actually wanted the flowers delivered outside of their delivery hours and the owner personally accommodated my wishes. I received Grade A customer service and I was also notified before and after she delivered them. She was a delight to do business with. I am overjoyed with my entire encounter.

name: Beth Hart
text: Martha Rea’s had been a referral for us out-of-towners so I was not worried about the quality or delivery, but both were right on target. My mother was very pleased with her birthday bouquet! Thank you.

name: varbara VLove
text: Great customer service

name: Amber Mertens
text: I use Martha Rea's often for business and always receive excellent customer service. Then, last week, I was on the recipient side of the delivery. My husband found out about Martha Rea's through an online search (not knowing that I use their services for business) and liked what he saw on their website and gave them a call. I received a beautiful arrangement in a very lovely vase at work the same day he placed the order. It was a wonderful surprise! By the way, the flowers are still beautiful a week later.

name: Shamara Ray
text: I am thrilled with the beautiful arrangement delivered to my daughter on her 25th birthday.  It could not have been more perfect.  The customer service was magnificent.  Such friendly people.

name: T.J. Conwell
text: Thank you for delivering these flowers - however, the balloon that was attached said "Happy Birthday", and I know that I ordered the "I Love You" balloon.  We are not upset, but rather, wanted to ensure you knew that attention to detail was lacking on this order.  For $73, I think that the order should at least be correct.  Thanks.

name: Marina Bowing
text: Such a nice place. Here you can find so many beautiful flowers. Each of them is decorated in a different original way. I was happy to find what I needed and bought a little more than I should, but I don't regret. They were gorgeous!

name: Anthony Raybon
text: I have purchased flowers through them numerous times now, they are always gorgeous and delivered in a timely manner.  I definitely recommend them to others!

name: Arlette Willis
text: My experience is noteworthy, the florists diligently worked to assure a timely arrival of my purchase! The floral arrangement was breathtakingly beautiful and very much appreciated. Thank you for your respectful care and attention to detail. This a florist I will call upon again!

name: Rick Hendrick
text: Thank you for going the extra mile for my delivery! You guys are the best!

name: Vicki Scott
text: This florist is so understanding and kind. She listened to my desires for my Mother's Urn and delivered the most beautiful flowers I've ever seen. She went out of her way to get the arrangement to the funeral home in Wetumpka on time and took great consideration and care to insure they would be beautiful, and they were. I wanted big and beautiful and she did more than that. You wouldn't work with a kinder person who listens and then you let her take it from there. You won't be disappointed and you won't be unhappy with wilting flowers. She a master of her craft. ~Vicki~

name: Teresa Rodden
text:
Nothing better than getting a picture and message saying how our flower arrangement put somebody else’s bouquet to shame.

Job well done!

name: Guardian Adjusters and Appraisers
text: Lovely sympathy floral basket. Thank you.

name: danielle jones
text:
Placed same day order on 8/27 for my mom's 75 birthday. The delivery man called my mom and said that he has been trying to catch up with her all day...lies! And that he could not come back to the house because it was out of his way - unprofessional behavior. My mom knew there was a delivery so she stayed home.

This morning I spoke to my mom who started that the flowers were on their way (around 9:30, 10 am) l, by 12 still no flowers...wow! I called the florist and spoke to I could care less PAM and told her to cancel my order.
Common sense would tell you to deliver flowers that you did not deliver on the previous day, butI guess they're a little slow.
Bottom line...I will never use this florist again, they've ruined my mom's special day. You disgust me...end of story!!!!

name: Uschi K
text: I highly recommend Martha Rea's Florist. This is a business that means to please and this has been the most amazing experience. When recently I had a disappointing delivery, Maria came to my house and substituted with a beautiful and healthy plant. Thank you Maria!

name: Chad White
text: These guys are fantastic.  Delivered my wife a beautiful arrangement with a little teddy bear on our anniversary very quickly.  Thanks again guys!

name: Danielle Davis
text: Terrible customer service!!!! I paid for a birthday bouquet for my mother's 50th birthday. I called to make SURE it would be delivered today. My mother was out of town of town doing mission work on her ACTUAL birthday and I am out of state and could not be there with her.  I spent all day thinking about how delighted she would be to get her surprise gift and They called me 15 minutes before they closed to tell me that they tried to take the flowers but it was too cold and they had no number for her, but they had MY number and didn't say anything until the employees were about to  walk out the door. Whoever was on the phone said they could do it TUESDAY....what in the WORLD. I am out of state and not able to be there for my mother's birthday celebration and the ONLY thing I had for her today is ruined. 1 hour before her birthday dinner she has NOTHING from me.  I am beyond upset. Thanks for ruining the birthday surprise. ....Terrible.

name: Nancy Breland
text:
I just wanted to thank your florist for the beautiful arrangement that you just made for my brother who is at Baptist South. He just got out of surgery after the flowers were delivered and was so delighted at how beautiful they were! He especially loved the lilies!
Thank you for making his sister (me) so thankful that her best wishes were sent to him,
with such beauty❣️
Sincerely,
Nancy Breland
Bainbridge, Georgia

name: Erin Dahlen
text: I have placed online orders at Martha Rea's twice now. I live in North Carolina and am having flowers delivered to my mom in a hospital in Montgomery. The flowers were delivered the same day I ordered them and were beautiful according to mom. Very pleased with the service, even for those of us out of state!

name: Kaylan Maradie
text: Spent 100 dollars, flowers looked absolutely nothing like picture. Don’t waist your money

name: Jean Fader
text: Beautiful flowers. Need to get web orders working properly.

name: Dontae Williams
text:
Placed last minute orders online. Delivered within three hours to my wife!

You guys ROCK!

Thanks for what you do.

name: Kim Lingner
text: I walked in while they were closing and they still took the time to get my order in and I greatly appreciate them in this time of need !!!!

name: Christie Tarantino
text: I ordered flowers from Martha Rea's for my sick mother and her caregiver for Valentine's day.  I received the confirmation and assumed that the order would be delivered as promised.  I found out that the delivery was not made on Friday, and thought that maybe it would be delivered on Saturday due to a backlog.  When they were not delivered on Saturday, I placed a call to the florist this morning and was told that a manager would call me back.  5 hours later, I still have not received a call.  I'm very disappointed by the lack of customer service.  At the least, I could have received some sort of notice that the flowers wouldn't not be delivered on time so that I wouldn't have the expectation that they would be.  But, to add insult to injury, they are now not addressing the problem at all.  If you want to ensure your order would be processed, I would not order from Martha Rea's.

name: Jennifer Comer
text: I was ordering from out of state and they took careful thought on my requests in the notes portion of the online ordering process.  The arrangement exceeded my expectation in quality, size, and beauty. Thank you, Martha Rea's, for your talent and consideration. I look forward to using your services in the future.

name: Clay Dudley
text: I placed an order over the phone on a Wednesday to send flowers to an office that had an employee pass away. I requested the flowers to be delivered on Thursday AM. I called the office/client and came to find out that they never received the flowers. I spoke with someone on Friday morning and they apologized for not getting them out and explained that they did not file the order, but they did charge my account. I understood that mistakes happened, but requested that the flowers be delivered promptly that morning. I found out that they were not delivered until close to 4PM that Friday... after most of the office had gone home for the weekend. Mistakes happen, but if you cannot correct them and honor your word, then you clearly do not care about your customers. Needless to say, I will not be using Martha Rea's again.

name: joan williams
text: Having been a patron while at home in Montgomery; being overseas in Doha,Qatar your online services allows me to deliver love across the oceans. Thank you MarthaRea's

name: Martha White
text: The flowers I've received from Martha Rea's have been of the highest quality.  The flowers are fresh, beautiful, and creatively arranged.

name: Simona Yelder
text: Thank you so much for all your help Ms.Maurean.I hope I'm saying  your name right. You was so helpful, I really appreciate all you did.

name: Adrian Hopkins
text:
Ordered through Teleflora same day. Arrangement was poorly put together.

Rose buds weren't matched well(some closed, some half open, some full bloom)

Leaves weren't trimmed well. Hopefully they bloom nicely

name: Brian Wren
text: HORRIBLE. Ordered 14 roses to come with spray roses and 3 balloons. What did my wife receive? 7 roses with spray roses and no balloons. Attempted to get it corrected and they were the rudest people we have ever dealt with. tried to make my wife believe i was lying about what i ordered. (i have receipts obviously) and even told my wife to be thankful she got anything on valentines day because she (the owner) had no one to give her anything for valentines day. Well if this is the way she treats customers i can only imagine how she treats people who arent supporting her business. i guess we see why she has noone. Flower situation was never corrected although she did get the balloons but not before they had my wife in tears with their rudeness.

name: Glenda Russell
text: Arrangements from Martha Rae's are ALWAYS beautiful.  If I'm sending or receiving I have never been disappointed.

name: Kathy Jackson
text: had flowers sent to my mother in montgomery and they were beautiful she loved them and the whole house was talking about these flowers for months .. great job

name: Let's talk with Jd & Me Me D
text: I've been ordering from out of state for the last 2 years and my recipient is always, always satisfied with her arrangements.. Thank youuuuuuuuuu!!!

name: Lauren Phelps
text: I order flowers from out of town and they couldn't have been more helpful!  They took the time to contact me and make the necessary arrangements for flowers going to a near by funeral home.

name: James Files
text: Thanks SO much.  Lynn loved the arrangement!

name: John Alexander
text: I've never been to the florist in person but have used them many times to send flowers to my daughter in Alabama. We have always been very satisfied.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Alexander we appreciate you and Mrs. Alexander tremendously!! We know how important it can be to a parent to celebrate a child's birthday and we are delighted you choose Martha Rea's for your floral needs! Thank you again and looking forward to continue the tradition!!

name: Joshua Simmons
text: Delivered on time and beautiful! My Gf absolutely adored them!

name: Daphne Johnson
text: Great customer service although I gave the wrong delivery address. Thank you very much.

name: Eric Isaacson
text: Whenever I need to impress someone I always immediately go to Jane and her talented crew. She has helped me out from dates to thank you gifts and even my moms birthday. Being an entreprenuer in the service industry I rarley run into places that meet my high standards for service, but this place met and exceeded! I highly recommend them for any of their sevices! Have used them and will continue to use them!!

name: Jenny Kim
text: It's very unkind. I will never go back.

name: Jay Villagomez
text: The corsage she did for my daughter was amazing!!! Honestly dont think i paid enough for it!!! Thank you guys so much!!

name: Josh Bryan
text: Ordered an arrangement for out of state for my mother who lives in Montgomery. The arrangement arrived as promised and was beautiful!

name: Troy Gerren
text: This is the most unprofessional florist I have ever come across. I ordered a white standing spray for a funeral. I paid  $95 for this arrangement and received 5 flowers in it. Tried to talk to the florist and they actually tried to suggest that the funeral home took the roses out that was not even advertised in the arrangement.When mentioned that the website says 100% guaranteed and was told the website does not state that. Then she had an attitude when talking to me.

resp.text:
We have gone through all of our past sales receipts for the past two weeks, and we are unable to find a receipt associated with your name. It seems that your purchase may have been done through a different service other than marthareasflorist.com.
Here at Martha Rea's we proudly support our local funeral homes and other business and we are sorry to hear that another company misinformed you about our affiliation. Best of luck getting in contact with that service to resolve this matter.

For future floral references please feel free to contact us directly, 334-262-1991 or visit our friendly website at http://www.marthareasflorist.com/ so we can handle your floral needs directly.

Best Wishes,
Martha's Rea's Floral Team

name: Robbie Amunds
text: Ordered same day delivery online at 9AM this morning. Never received it. Called the store 5 times throughout the day and left two voicemails and never got a call back. Hopefully I will get them tomorrow. Very disappointed.

name: Darius Holley
text: Always Wonderful! I will not use anyone else EVER!

name: Kim Namjoon's Sweetheart
text: Beautiful arrangements, great customer service.

name: Michael Davis
text: Awesome. Martha Rea's sure made a beautiful arrangement for my precious girlfriend. Thanks a million.

name: Trish P.
text: They were so helpful & kind. I really appreciate them!!!!

name: William Stone
text: 32 years together and the flowers made it special. great job!!!!

name: Kevin Temple
text: Very nice flowers!

name: leonard gordon
text: Great florist and outstanding service

name: Mary Lynne Wright
text: Wonderful customer service! Thanks!

name: Austin Cook
text: Terrible customer service, and a terrible attitude. I cancelled my order so I can't speak on the flowers.

name: Vermon Tate
text: Terrible customer service. Shop somewhere else.

name: jennifer wilkerson
text: Very dependable and good prices

name: Doing Whatsright
text: Horrible

name: Maxine Downing
text: My family has used Fergusons for decades and I know why. I ordered a blanket for my mother's funeral and it contained what I requested but I left the rest to them and it was stunning! I also received numerous arrangements for the occassion from Fergusons as well and they were absolutely beautiful. When I placed my order, I was assured they would take care of me (as I was nervous because I was ordering for my family) and they did not disappoint, nor have they ever. They are my go-to florist for anything local.

name: Stacey Garmon
text: Wes did a fabulous job on flowers for my daughter’s wedding.  Good price, EXCELLENT customer service.

name: Seneka Stokes
text: I order a floral arrangement for my Mother for Mother’s Day and it started dying after two days. Not only that, the floral arrangement I asked for was nowhere near as full as the one I saw on the website. When I went to pick the arrangement up and asked about its fullness, I was told that the flowers would bloom once they get warm. Some of the small roses that were in the arrangement were broken when I picked it up. There was green floral tape around the top rim of the vase which could have been easily concealed with a nice ribbon. It was so much green foam in the bottom of the small sized vase. That may be why the flowers aren’t lasting as they don’t have enough room and are poorly cut and crammed in. We put the few flowers that we could salvage in a larger vase. It’s unfortunate that I paid $66 dollars for an arrangement that my mother will only get to enjoy for a few days. I have Walmart flower bouquets that are outlasting these. I usually buy special occasion flowers from Publix at a cheaper price and better quality work, but I wanted to patronize Ferguson’s florist because they are a locally owned business. However I will not use their service again because it seems as though the work was rushed and thrown together and just not worth the money.

name: Tashara Janae
text:
I have been ordering flowers for my mother every two weeks since the unfortunate passing of her husband. The flowers have not been up to par. We went to the florist today to return the flowers. When they arrived they were cut too short, looked nothing like the picture and were drooping and dying after two days. We arrived with a photo of the online order and were told that there was a shortage of flowers and they “substituted.” However, the substitution was poor quality. The owner, Noah Ferguson, came
To speak with us. He was rude, condescending and spoke disrespectfully to me and my mother. I will NEVER order from Ferguson again. I will be reporting this business to the BBB.

name: Enga Sturns
text: They are very nice people but the wait time was a little frustrating

name: Tony Lesser
text: Fast and friend. Will use again

name: Cindy Camp
text: I liked the white banner and bow for my friends mom for the front door

name: Tolly Walker
text: Great flower selection.

name: Katherine Parks
text: I got my dress and flowers there they were so helpful

name: Seasoned Swine
text:
The flowers for the funeral in May were exceptional. Honestly the prettiest flower arrangements I had ever laid eyes on. This last weekend an artificial arrangement was picked up for her headstone. I have to boast of how real and professional they looked. If anyone is considering going anywhere else in Alabama don't do it! :)

Thank you very much for all you have done this year!

name: Michael Harper
text: We had the most beautiful flowers from your shop. We had lost one of our granddaughters , I wanted them to be very beautiful for her and they were, again thank you very much.

name: Randy Martin
text: My daughter was married here April 19. We let Linda and Lori handle most everything from minister, D.J. and photos. The Azalea's were in bloom which made for gorgeous photos. The food was delicious and the arrangements and flowers were awesome. Thank you so much for a job well done and so stress free.

name: gaige tedder
text: I needed a special bouquet for a very special lady in my life, and I had a list of very particular flowers that I wanted in the bouquet. A few of the flowers were hard to come by due to the time of year, and I needed the bouquet in three days and Ferguson pulled it off! All 23 flowers were there and beautifully arranged. I will definitely be using Ferguson for all of my flower needs.

name: Brenda Bone
text: Friendly staff, always there to help you. Traded with them all my life and my parents did too.

name: bnbskaggs
text: Wonderful business with great service. They always have endless varieties of flowers and I love that they are open 7 days a week.

name: Amber Rigsby-Bellew
text: Made a corsage for my last minute son on the spot. Very appreciated!!

name: FireBerlin
text: It's so hard choosing a florist from out-of-state. I went with Ferguson Florist for a flower arrangement for my aunt who has lived in Attalla all of her life. She LOVED the arrangement, said it was the prettiest she had ever received. Her sister later confirmed that Ferguson Florist does very nice work.

name: Shirley Briggs
text: I received an arrangement from Ferguson’s and it Wes absolutely beautiful and the real test is if the flowers last a week they sure have thank you

name: Tammy
text: I want to say Thank You for doing a wonderful job on a floral arrangement that was done for my Mom and Dad's anniversary to put on Mom's gravesite.I had went to several florists trying to find the perfect arrangement and was very disappointed and didn't think I would find what I was looking for until I walked into Ferguson's.Everyone at Ferguson's was very polite and so willing to do their best at helping me to make sure I got the perfect arrangement to please my Dad.When my Dad went to pick it up the next day he was extremely happy with the arrangement.Ferguson's Florist has gotten two customer's that will only use Ferguson's for any arrangements we need from now on.If anyone wants to be pleased with beautiful arrangements and very polite,caring people then Ferguson's is the place to go.

name: Sebrina Crosby
text: I have never left a review for anything, good or bad, but the treatment I received from Ferguson Florist was so abhorrent, I felt compelled to not only leave a review but file a formal complaint with the BBB. I placed an order via their website to be delivered to a location clearly listed as one of the areas they service. A few hours later, I receive a call that they cannot deliver to that area. After being handed off to the manager, before I could even speak, the manager was SCREAMING at me that I'd have to pay 2.5 times the delivery fee that the website listed (which was determined after putting in the exact location). She said she didn't care if I got the flowers or not because I wasn't the one making them, they were.  She continued to scream and berate me. I have never, ever been treated so poorly by anyone, let alone anyone in any sort of customer service sector. The thing is, I would've paid the increase in the delivery fee, but it was the screaming and berating me, without even letting me explain what their own website said, that was so awful and upsetting.

name: Doug
text: I ordered a peace lilly for a funeral service.  They did not deliver the plant to the funeral home.  They refuse to own up to their mistake like a reputable business would and insinuate that the funeral home, my family and I are not being truthful.

name: James Roberts
text: Always has a good selection of flowers.

name: Gina Farley
text: I have asked for unique arrangements from Ferguson's and they have gone above and beyond every time. Excellent customer service!

name: Logan Barnard
text: We have used Ferguson’s many times over the years and have had no complaints. My family ordered several arrangements from Furgeson’s and several other from other florists but only the Ferguson’s arrangements were wilted or mush within 24 hours at the funeral home. Furguson’s blames the funeral home heating however the other arranments were unaffected. I’ve never experienced this before but considering the amount of money involved I will take my business elsewhere in the future.

name: carin whitney
text: Always beautiful!  Birthday, prom, funeral, whatever the occasion, Ferguson Florist never disappoints us.

name: Wanda Payne
text: Asked for flowers for a baby's funeral. I got "DARK" bule roses. The leaves were black

name: Carol Payne
text: Friendly and quality work.  Very helpful  .

name: Joleen Hibbs
text: Great place to take prom pictures.

name: Bridgett Whitney
text: Beautiful arrangements & great customer service!

name: Terry McElrath
text: Very friendly and helpful staff

name: Charlie Ridgeway
text: The Best In Town Bar None

name: Bonnie Atchley
text: Great service and kind.

name: Mandy Vice
text: Great selection.

name: Dollie Gore
text: My experience was awful and very disappointed. The arrangement was for a funeral it was a $150.00 arrangement but looked like a $15.00 arrangement. I will not use Feguson's again.

name: Jnifr Hill
text: The staff was very friendly.

name: Jimi Griffin
text: Great place for flowers I found what I needed in no time

resp.text: Thank you for the positive feedback, Jimi!

name: matthew thomason
text: Norton’s always does a great job... best place to get flowers and arrangements in B’ham.

name: Justin Flowers
text: I love this company. I've never had anything but quality service with great looking flowers.  A friend of mine told me about them a few years back and they still do a great job today. This is my go-to flower shop for delivery!

resp.text: Thank you for the positive feedback, Justin! We’ve been trying to do a great job since 1921!

name: Tint Pro
text: They did a great job on the flowers for our anniversary. On time and they looked great.

resp.text: Thank you! Happy belated anniversary!

name: Vance Olmstead
text: Another job well done! Best florist in town that always leaves me amazed with their end result!

resp.text: Out of all the great florists in town, Vance, we're flattered to see you think we're the best. There's nothing we love more than helping you out. If you ever need another beautiful arrangement, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Felisha, Owner

name: Donny Harden
text: thank you to the staff @ Amy's..  We live out of town, I called late morning and placed the order for our daughters birthday. I got a text and picture from daughter at 1:20 of the flowers, she was so excited, in her words "BEAUTIFUL" ...Amy's helped make a daughter and teachers day... THANK YOU!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Donny!  It's our pleasure to make sure every customer is taken care of.

name: Bobby Hagler
text: I ordered flowers for my wife on our 40th anniversary at 4:30 pm on 5/28 to be delivered between 12:00 - 2:00 pm on 5/29. They send an email at 11:57 am on 5/29 cancelling the order. This is pathetic.

resp.text: We apologize for the miscommunication in your order, Bobby. Given the long weekend for Memorial Day, we were closed Saturday and Monday. We also had a technical issue that didn't reflect our correct hours online. We understand your frustration and we are sorry for the inconvenience. If you'd like to discuss this further offline, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Felisha, Owner

name: Camy Caruso
text: I just called there to order flowers for my daughter in law.  The lady who answered the phone was rude. She acted like it was an inconvenience.  I'm glad I didn't spend my money on the flowers there. And the 1 star was too much. Ordering somewhere else!

resp.text: Camy, I'm so disappointed to hear we've left you with such a poor impression. You should always expect to be treated like a friend when you work with us to create a beautiful arrangement, and I can assure you this was just a misunderstanding. I hope you'll consider giving us the chance to make things right. -Felisha, Owner

name: Neica Asher
text: I ordered flowers online and called with special delivery instructions. Amy's you went above and beyond with your customer service. Thanks for delivering beautiful flowers and being so friendly to the lady that received them. Excellent experience all around!

resp.text: There's nothing like getting to share smiles with our neighbors, Neica. It was our pleasure to deliver the beautiful arrangement for you. Please don't hesitate to give us a call if you ever need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: shirley smith
text: I used Google to find a place to deliver something, out of the ordinary, for a friend staying at a local hotel---and since it didn't require flowers I was at their mercy. The kind receptionist was able to help with everything in a matter of a few minutes... EXCEPTIONAL. Thank you!!

resp.text: Thanks for the support, Shirley! Glad to hear we were able to help out with your delivery. Let us know if you ever need anything else. -Felisha, Owner

name: Teddy Jackson
text: Great experience, Arrangement looked great! I will definitely use Amy's again.

resp.text: Teddy, I'm happy to hear that your order was everything you wanted. Our arrangements are some of the freshest in the area, so we're happy that you'll continue to support us. If you'd like anything specific, feel free to let us know next time. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jeri Moody
text: I called Amy's Florist from Georgia in hopes of ordering a plant for my son's girlfriend who just had surgery. Mark was a pleasure on the phone. He was very helpful in suggesting a plant, as well as tips on how to care for it. The delivery guy was also kind and delivered it promptly as well. I would definitely use Amy's again if I find myself needing another delivery in Tuscaloosa, AL. Thank you!!

resp.text:
Jeri, thanks for the stars! We're so glad to hear we were able to help you out. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else!
-Felisha, Owner

name: Larry Savino
text: I am in New York and needed a Great Easter basket for my Daughter who is in Tuscaloosa for college. I called in morning and the women I spoke with was very polite,Patent,and knowledgeable of her products. I described what I wanted she said NO PROBLEM, ask me for my budget and 3 hours latter my Daughter called and said she loved it. What more could you ask for from a vendor. Thank you to the staff at Amy's I appreciate the great service we received

resp.text: Larry, I know a year has gone by, but I just had to stop and thank you for these wonderful words! I'm happy we were able to help you make your daughter's day. I appreciate your support and hope you won't hesitate to reach out next time you need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: CATHY HOWELL
text: I went in to Amy’s to get a plant for a funeral and there was 3 different people helping us and we got 3 different prices.  So unorganized. Feel as tho they are ripping people off!!  Watch when you order!  NONE of the flowers had prices so we had to ask. We left and went to Stephanie’s where all the plants had prices you knew what you were paying for.

resp.text:
Cathy, we try to be upfront with our prices, so I'm sorry to hear you didn't leave with that impression. I appreciate your feedback, though, and I hope you'll give us another chance in the future. Take care.
-Felisha, Owner

name: Virginia Sanford
text: Always very helpful with choosing the right flower or plant. Also very helpful with last minute needs.

resp.text: Virginia, glad to hear you can always count on us! Thanks for the kind words, and we hope to see you again soon. -Felisha, Owner

name: Mona
text: I was sent some flowers by my boyfriends parents for Christmas. The whole arrangement fell apart when I got it, as they cut the stems so short they wouldn’t even stay in the container. It was mostly filler and the flowers died within 2 days. Highly disappointed.

resp.text: Mona, we're always happy to be a part of such sweet gestures. However, we searched our database history and don't see the transaction you're speaking about. I can assure you that our displays are well-made and always fresh. That's what sets our flowers above the rest. In the future, we're always happy to provide you with a quality arrangement at a moment's notice. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jennifer Stigall
text: Great experience using Amy's Florist! Very nice people to work with!  I definitely recommend using them, and they are LOCALLY Family owned!

resp.text: I know a couple of years have gone by, Jennifer, but I didn't want to miss the chance to thank you for this awesome review! Your recommendation means the world to me, and I'm so happy to read you had a great experience here. Please don't hesitate to reach out next time you need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: Christian Parris
text: I had a wonderful experience on the phone ordering flowers for my girlfriend. Cynthia was very helpful and funny

resp.text: Thank you Christian!  We hope your girlfriend enjoys her flowers.

name: M P
text: Terrible Customer Service. In attempt to getting my girlfriend some Halloween themed flowers, Amy's Florist dropped the ball. I placed an order for one item and 5 minutes later they called and said they did not have the item or vase in stock YET I was still charged. After emailing and calling back, I was fully refunded. I decided to try my luck again and place another order but for a different item. Same thing, received a call saying it was not in stock. The people calling me were horribly unhelpful and rude and made it seem like I was to blame. Why have something on your website if it not in stock? I also find it suspicious Amy's Florist and Pat's Florist have the same exact webpage layouts besides color scheme. Trying my luck at a third floral shop and see if I finally can get something...

resp.text: Matthew, I am very sorry you had a bad experience with us. Yes you placed an order off our website that stated NO substitutions.  The closer it has gotten to Halloween we have sold out of most the containers. We would have been glad to do a similar arrangement for you but you said no substitutions. Also you did email us and I got back with you as soon as I seen the email, unfortunately I don't check my emails frequently.  The staff called and left you a message regarding the order, and soon as they spoke with you a refund was issued.  As for the two websites bringing the same...YES they are because a floral company designed them for us.  Nothing suspicious at all about that.  Again, I am very sorry we wasn't able to help you. It is not our goal to lose customers.

name: N Hinton
text: My Dad works here. The manager and staff are very cordial and my father ,one of the delivery guys, is extremely attentive and punctual in delivering the flowers. My Dad's a work-a-holic.

resp.text: I know several months have passed, but I didn't want to miss the chance to thank you for this wonderful review! We love having your dad on our team, and we appreciate your reaching out with an all-star rating. -Felisha, Owner

name: Ben Tuckerman
text: Friendly staff. Locally owned. Beautiful flowers. What's not to love!!

resp.text: Thank you, Ben! Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else. Take care. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jack Przebienda
text: Flowers were delivered and my girlfriend absolutely loved them. Great Value, would recommend

resp.text: We are so glad she loved them. Thank you for call Amy's Florist. We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Andrea White
text:
Really rude people! Terrible customer service.  Called to get more information on their flower arrangements, unfortunately their website is limited on options so I went on their Facebook page and was able to find a lot more options for what I was looking for.  I had to literally described them the flowers I was looking at, and told them it would be easier for them to jump on their page with me .... nop! They started getting all mad and raised their voice over the phone because THEY DIDN'T KNOW how to even use Facebook.  The woman that was on the phone with me even started talking over me.  WILL NEVER buy anything from here and WILL NEVER recommend this place.
One star is even too much!

resp.text: Andrea, we want all of our guests to feel comfortable when talking to us, so I'm sorry to hear about your experience. It sounds like there was a miscommunication here, and I appreciate the feedback. If you do choose to do business with us again, we'll work hard to make it a better experience. -Felisha, Owner

name: Pat Stephenson
text: Nice folks, but somehow they lost the order, it was a funeral so you only get one shot at it.

resp.text: Pat I'm sorry to hear this.  I have researched our data base and I'm not showing where an order was placed in your name.  I surely hope if the order was placed with us, that we took care of you to make sure you where completely satisfied.

name: Holly Holman
text: Extremely disappointed in Amy's.  I just sent my mother a birthday bouquet via Teleflora and paid extra for the Premium bouquet which featured a larger arrangement with more flowers (6 large roses and 6 smaller roses).  My mother just texted a picture of the flowers to say thank you and there are 2 roses and a bunch of filler flowers.  I'm in Kansas City, but believe if I were at home, I would be making my way to have a serious talk with Amy or whoever stole my money.  I could've gotten more money's worth out of a Publix bouquet.  I'm seriously angry.  This was NOT a $95 arrangement.

resp.text:
Hello Holly,
I'm so sorry you were disappointed in the arrangement. It's not our goal to make customers unhappy.  In this situation going through a 3rd party to place an order is not always the best thing to do. You mention you spent $95 on the arrangement but that's not what the sender gave us to work with. Also, out of the total, we had to take out for the 2 balloons and delivery charge that was associated with the order.  Yes, you could have got more flowers from Publix, but I don't sell Publix quality flowers. I only carry the freshest and finest. I agree the arrangement doesn't look like the picture you picked out and I'm more than happy to correct our mistake.  We want every customer to be completely satisfied ...that's our goal. We gain nothing from an unhappy customer!

name: Brian Patterson
text: I certainly wouldn't buy from a place that hangs up on its callers, as a vendor.... very unprofessional

resp.text: Not sure why you would make a statement as such!  My staff and I are very friendly to every caller unless you are a telemarketer.  We all know how annoying that can be.

name: Tara Campbell
text: Not so nice.  The person I ordered from had an attitude the entire time I was on the phone.  UA discount or not, I do not recommend.

name: Dale Dowdle
text: ALWAYS a Great Experience

resp.text: Dale, thanks so much for stopping in! Hope to see you here again, as always! -Felisha, Owner

name: Theron Struzik
text: Lovely store front and flowers are ok.

resp.text: Thanks for visiting our store

name: Erika Deaton
text: Went and rented a tuxedo for my son's prom. They have so much stuff.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words!!

name: lisa pritchard
text: Wonderful place, great people!

resp.text: Thanks so much! We love our customers!!

name: Susan Randolph
text: Every item was distinct and beautiful! Reasonably priced also.

resp.text: Thanks so much!

name: Azsah Arnett
text: Beautiful flowers. Amazing stuff in there store.

resp.text: Thanks for coming in. We appreciate out customers so much!!

name: Karen Ball
text: Not open often enough

resp.text: Thanks for your input. We are open 6 day a week and are on call on weekends.

name: Patrick Heintz
text: Very friendly

resp.text: Thanks!!

name: Will Hallman
text: Incredible work! My daughter is sick and flowers are her favorite. I believe these brightened her day. Thank you Joy's Flowers!

name: Jamie Moon
text: I ordered a premium floral arrangement for a funeral.  The basket was delivered on time to the viewing, which is more than I can say for some companies. However, it was not as pictured and it was the most pitiful, smallest, arrangement received that day. An $80 basket should not be an embarrassment.

name: Corey McIntyre
text: Flowers I ordered and had sent turned out beautiful..I did the custom pick and let the specialist work there magic ..excellent job and service ..highly recommend

name: Chris H
text: Cool shop with more than just flowers. They were a great help and put together a nice bouquet last minute.

name: Audra Williams
text: I ordered and paid for the premium 68 dollar basket..to say when I saw this arrangement that I was sorely disappointed and felt taken advantage of for the amount I paid is an understatement! I live out of state, so I guess the florist thought that I wouldn't see the end product.... I will never recommend or use this florist again! I could have purchased a basket in my home town and delivered it myself for less than I paid for this arrangement.

name: Emily Crumpler
text: I order a few baskets at once for different people.  One basket got put at the house behind theirs (there are two houses on their lot). This business offered and took another one out right away, they fix the situation and did not act like it was a problem at all. I would order from them in a heartbeat.  I personally also thought the prices were reasonable.

name: Jn F. Turner
text: I received roses for Valentines day from my husband he was very disappointed at the arrangement looked really cheap and nothing like the picture arrangement he saw online.  You could barely see the roses. I was very disappointed as well after learning what he spent for it. He is still apologizing for it.

name: Senior HelpersNEO
text: I ordered an arrangement from Joy's for the first time a few days ago, and my experience was amazing. The hydrangeas were beautiful and the staff was very helpful. They were able to fulfill my order in a few short hours (for a great price). I highly recommend Joy's, they take great care of their customers, and their flowers are of great quality! You will not be disappointed. Five stars

name: Courtney Moon
text: Ordered an arrangement online for a funeral. Extremely disappointed and shocked when I actually saw the arrangement. Much much smaller in person.  Absolutely wasn't worth the price paid. Would not recommend ordering online. Will not be ordering again.

name: Robert Owens
text: Ok.   Not the warmest reception.   Will try somewhere else next time.

name: Craig Bowman
text: Wonderful experience there

name: Lanicsha W
text: Overall the service from this business was exceptional, I was pleased with both the delivery and the quality of the floral arrangement. I would definitely recommend this business to everyone.

name: Kristen Frost
text: Joy's did my wedding and they did an AMAZING job!! They are my go-to florist for everything! They do such wonderful work and are always so kind! I give them all the stars and will continue to use them and refer them to friends!!

name: Casey Riddlesperger
text: Wonderful people. Great customer service. GORGEOUS flowers. Called with a last minute order needed for the next morning. Beyond impressed with the results. The arrangement was perfect!  Will definitely order from Joy’s again.

name: Kayla Rose
text: Beautiful arrangement. Great price. Fast friendly delivery.

name: Viv Pace
text: Very poor customer service skills taking order by phone giving cryptic answers as if uninterested. It's easier to simply go elsewhere.

resp.text: I am so sorry to hear this. We will take note of this and make sure to do a better job. I am truly sorry that you were not happy with your experience. If there is anything we can do to make it better, please feel free to call 256-546-6381 and ask for Kristen.

name: Shanell Taylor
text: My experience with Joy's Flowers was outstanding! The ordering process was simple. They arrived very quickly. And the flowers were amazing! My mother loved them. I highly recommend ordering from them!

name: Dawn Frost
text: Nice atmosphere for a floral shop great decor with all kinds of items to decorate your home with. From hand painted vases to a refinished dresser for sale. Lady who worked there was very and helpful. She helped me decide on a bouquet for a friends birthday. Will be back to order more flowers for this Valetines Day!

name: C. Bos
text: We count on Joy's flowers to keep beautiful arrangements on Mom's table for every special day. They accommodate special requests as best they can with the flowers they have. Our mom loves pink. :)

name: Crystal Grochola
text: This is a wonderful flower shop and gift shop. Such wonderful people who work there and overall great prices. I will be using them again. Love Joy's .....

name: Jessie Miller
text: My corsage for prom was horrible put together the rose fell off 30 mins of wearing it (thank god I had done senior lead out already) and the baby breath flow had out even bloomed yet and we paid 36.00$ so I give you  a 1

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that. We will be in touch with you soon in hopes that we can do something to make this better. Is there a name other than Jessie Miller that your order would be under?

name: Jay P
text: This is at least the 4th year I have ordered from Joy's and my sister loves the arrangements and baskets I send her from here.  This time I spoke with Tiffany and she was bright, pleasant and knowledgeable.  We were able for me to visualize a similar arrangement online  My former wife's family was in the flower business here in South Florida for decades and I appreciate good service and great arrangements and Joy's does it extremely well.

name: Jc Chandler
text: Love this shop. I walk in and they know exactly what I want and my name. Recommend highly. They rap the roses anyway I ask.

name: Kathryn Ballard
text: Excellent service, reasonable prices, and high quality in the snack basket that I ordered. I would highly recommend Joy's...

name: Gene Walker
text: I ordered funeral arrangement and it was not delivered even after being told it had been when I checked the morning of service. Then they were suppose to have a plant delivered to the home of the mother of deceased and has been 2 days and still no plant. I live out of state and called the florist (Joys) myself. Will not use nor recommend them ever again.

name: Laura Singleton
text: VERY EASY TO ORDER ONLINE AND WAS VERY IMPRESSED TO GET AN EMAIL ADVISING ONCE ORDER HAD BEEN DELIVERED

name: Kelsey Todd
text: I got an email saying the flowers were delivered to my friend and she never received them. Hoping this will be fixed, but I am very unsatisfied right now. They were delivered after store hours with no way to figure out what happened so I am super upset. :(

name: C.Eric. Holcomb
text: Wonderful place to find the flowers that you want for that special someone.

name: Tonya Mayhall
text: It was so easy to order and when I called the person I spoke with was so nice

name: Colleen Reed
text: My daughter was very happy with her beautiful flowers!

name: Craig Boose
text: Very embarrassed with the pitiful arrangement i ordered.  Never again will I use this florist.

name: ethan johnson
text: Best florist in Etowah County!! Hands down

name: David Stamps
text: One of the best.

name: Terri Webb
text: Love the employees and their work

name: Edwin Smith
text: Joy"s is Fantastic!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Montez Barker
text: Great gift

name: Regina Vinson Ford
text: Very rude

name: Teisha Johnson
text: Beautiful arrangements and beautiful gifts!!

name: Donna S
text: Great service with fresh flowers

name: Michal Massey
text: 2 stars because the strawberries were good. What wasn’t were the flowers received. They were more dead than alive when picked up. Picked up from the store. They are already over  priced and then to look like this, never again. I will not be back for strawberries or flowers after this. Pictures will be added.

name: Tariq
text: My order couldn't be completed in the manner I ordered it, and it also couldn't be delivered either. All that considered, these guys are outstanding at heart. I got some seriously bad news while standing in the store, and the employee went out of his way to make sure that I received no more negativity while in that establishment. The order was emaculent.

name: TDB
text: Sad and pitiful. I'm embarrassed that these were delivered to a friend from me. Nothing like the pictures online. I visited the store to complain and she saw nothing wrong with them; however,  I did receive a refund.

name: Diana SSuarez
text: Terrible customer service. There was a delivery that should have been made on February 14, 2021. The delivery was never made. No one has called about the delay. I have tried to call multiple times and no one answers. When I check online for the status of the order it says that they are "preparing it". I am really baffled by the lack of communication and professionalism from this store.

name: Henry McElreath
text: I use the website to order.  It is easy and quick. There is a huge selection of fruits and candies.  They deliver when they say they will and my friends are always happy with their baskets.

name: Andrew Phelps
text: Do not rely on their delivery. I ordered for my wife's birthday to be delivered to her workplace. It finally just made it... as they've packed up for the day. Silly me, i thought ordering a week in advance would be enough time for them to figure out how to deliver to a business

resp.text: Andrew, we apologize. Our mission is to always deliver the best possible customer service experience and we’re so sorry we fell short. We want to make this right. Please send us your order information at orderteam@edible.com.

name: Ruth Dailey
text: Placed an order to be delivered on Thursday and 3 days later had not arrived. Nobody answer the phone!

name: Allison
text: They were not even PLANNING to deliver my "SAME DAY DELIVERY" order until TWO DAYS LATER and did not even reach out to let me know. No phone call, no email, nothing. I even paid extra to have same day delivery. What the heck?? I had to call them to find out what was going on. Worst. Customer. Service. EVER. Will never order from here again. WOW.

name: S D
text: Horrible customer service, specifically on 23 Feb 21.  I’m on military orders in DC.  Ordered VDay gifts for my mom and daughter.  They failed to deliver my order for VDay, understandably due to weather.  Spoke to them twice patiently thru the week.  Was told they could deliver it on 21 Feb.  never happened.  Called today and was told “we’re working on orders and calls from yesterday, we can work yours tomorrow.”  I ordered before yesterday...I called before yesterday.  Finally just requested a refund and the girl said done and hung up on me.  She failed to refund both my orders so I had to call back.  Outstanding customer service.

name: Chelsea E
text: Horrible customer service at the huntsville area!! My parents never received their arrangement after i placed the order well over two weeks ago! I was told by a staff member that it was on the way at 3pm and now (7pm) I've been on hold for the last twenty minutes trying to figure out where it is! after reading all of these reviews, im convinced there's a truck driver somewhere eating lots of delicious fruit and chocolate... Can I please just have a refund?

name: Ann West
text: Half of my daughters Birthday delivery (from her Military Sister )came apparently the chocolate dipped bananas weren’t ready and were supposed to be delivered before 4pm. They never delivered them and will not answer the phone ! I DO NOT APPRECIATE MY ARMY DAUGHTER THAT IS DEPLOYED AT THE MOMENT AND SENT HER SISTER A GIFT BEING CHARGED FOR ITEMS THAT WERE NOT DELIVERED! That’s theft !

name: David Carr
text: Ordered on 2 occasions, both orders incorrect. The cookies they sent this time looked like they had already been picked over by rats, and their phone is ALWAYS BUSY. same as last year. Never again.

name: Rose Marie
text: Excellent surprise and beautifully displayed!

name: M. Alexa
text:
My order was not delivered after the staff told me it would be. They ruined a surprise I planned for my son and his family. I called the store for a second time and they had closed. I am beyond disappointed and have left multiple messages asking for a refund.
Update: Eventually delivered the following day.

name: Jet Jones
text: The owner of this location is magnificent! He made sure my  Mother's Day order was correct, even with the high volume of orders,  wonderful customer service. Very polite, store very clean. 100% satisfied. Would definitely recommend this location.

name: Haley
text: I just ordered an early Mother’s Day edible arrangement two days ago. They called me when it was ready in case I wanted to pick it up early. When I got there, it looked great! They were extremely nice and gave me some ideas to keep the chocolate covered strawberries in good shape for my 15 min drive home in a hot car. I hadn’t even thought about that, so it was very nice for them to mention. I will be ordering from them again in the future.

name: Linda Bellamy
text: I usually call for special occasions for my husband. The arrangements are nicely done and it’s eaten within 3 days. Delivery is not always dependable, but the workers are courteous.

name: Collin Walker
text: Terrible customer service and my order was never delivered, they barely answer the phone and never reached out to me about my undelivered order.

name: B. Christine
text:
Update:  Feb 2, 2018

So after a year of not ordering an Edible Arrangement I decided to give them another try! This time I was blown away by the EXCELLENT service I received!!! The manager MARK is the epitome of a great manager with EXCELLENT customer service.  I had an arrangement scheduled to be delivered this morning 2/2/2018 to a business for an individual, but the individual decided not to go to work that day to my dismay. However, Mark said "No worries, we will send it out on Monday, don't let that upset you!"  He is such a great example of what managers should be!! I will support his store from here forward!

August 2016

Thanks again Whitesburg store really enjoyed the arrangement and service.
